name: Demonstration Blog Post
post_body:
This is an example blog post. You can delete this blog post by going to the blog dashboard.

We hope you enjoy your HubSpot!
post_summary: This is an example blog post. You can delete this blog post by going to the blog dashboard.

name: Demonstrating the Blog Post API
post_body:
This blog post is meant to demonstrate the capabilities of the CMS API.

Part content system, part personalization engine. HubSpot's CMS is the first integrated website, blog and landing page system to be optimized for mobile right out-of-the-box. Fully integrated with every marketing channel, it adapts to each viewer's unique context.

HubSpot is a complete inbound marketing platform. So not only are all of the tools you use in one place, your customers get a seamless experience from email to social to web. Brilliant.
